name: China Pharma Holdings, Inc.
description: China Pharma Holdings, Inc. is a pharmaceutical company based in China that specializes in the research, development, manufacturing, and marketing of a diverse range of pharmaceutical products. Founded in 2003, CPHI has focused on providing high-quality healthcare solutions to its customers, particularly in the areas of oncology, cardiovascular, and infectious diseases. The company operates state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities that adhere to stringent international standards, ensuring the safety and efficacy of its products. CPHI's product line includes prescription drugs, over-the-counter medications, and dietary supplements, catering to both domestic and international markets. With a strong emphasis on innovation, CPHI invests significantly in research and development to expand its product portfolio and improve therapeutic outcomes. The company actively collaborates with various healthcare professionals and institutions to enhance its product offerings and reach a broader audience. As part of its commitment to improving global health, CPHI aims to contribute to the advancement of medical science and the accessibility of healthcare services.

seo.meta_title: China Pharma Holdings, Inc. | Pharmaceutical Solutions for Global Health
seo.meta_description: Explore China Pharma Holdings, Inc., a leader in pharmaceutical development and manufacturing. Discover innovative healthcare solutions and our commitment to global health.

faq.question: What does China Pharma Holdings specialize in?
faq.answer: China Pharma Holdings specializes in the research, development, manufacturing, and marketing of pharmaceutical products.

faq.question: Where is China Pharma Holdings headquartered?
faq.answer: China Pharma Holdings is headquartered in Haikou, Hainan, China.

faq.question: What types of products does China Pharma offer?
faq.answer: China Pharma offers oncology products, cardiovascular drugs, and infectious disease medications.

faq.question: When was China Pharma Holdings founded?
faq.answer: China Pharma Holdings was founded in 2003.
